TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManipulationDelta extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含操作事件發生時累積的轉換資料。

span.span: Contains transformation data that is accumulated when manipulation events occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含在操作的位置變更的相關資訊。The class contains information about the changes in the position of a manipulation. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 會解譯為變更， ，或。 interprets the changes as a , , or . 當事件發生於，使用屬性来轉換的物件，應該操作物件。When the event occurs on a , use the properties on a object to transform the object that should be manipulated. 類別提供兩個屬性的型別:和。The class provides two properties of type : and . 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 此範例套用， ，和屬性來移動、 調整大小，和旋轉。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationdelta)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationdelta)]

span.span: The linear motion of the manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

param.name: rotation
param.span: 操作作業的旋轉 (以度為單位)。

span.span: The rotation of the manipulation in degrees.

param.name: scale
param.span: 操作已依照乘數調整大小的量。

span.span: The amount the manipulation has resized as a multiplier.

param.name: expansion
param.span: 操作已調整大小的量 (以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位)。

span.span: The amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Vector Expansion { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Windows.Vector Expansion
Public ReadOnly Property Expansion As Vector
public: property System::Windows::Vector Expansion { System::Windows::Vector get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定操作已調整大小的量 (以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

value.span: 操作已調整大小的量 (以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位)。

span.span: The amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性都報告調整大小的操作。The and properties both report a resizing manipulation. 兩者之間的差異是在其報告的值的方式。The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported. 屬性報告中的調整大小操作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]。The property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]. 屬性報告與乘數的值。The property reports the value as a multiplier. 如果為 0.5，操作解譯為減少大小的百分之 50。If is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent. 如果為 2，此操作會解譯為增加了 100%的大小。If is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent.

MemberSignature.Value: public double Rotation { get; }
.property instance float64 Rotation
Public ReadOnly Property Rotation As Double
public: property double Rotation { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定操作的旋轉度數。

span.span: Gets or sets the rotation of the manipulation in degrees.

value.span: 操作作業的旋轉 (以度為單位)。

span.span: The rotation of the manipulation in degrees.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性報告操作會解譯為沿著軸旋轉的方式。The property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as rotating around an axis. 軸通常是連絡人的起始處理的兩個點之間的點。The axis is usually the point between the two points of contact that initiated the manipulation. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 此範例套用， ，和屬性來移動、 調整大小，和旋轉。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationdelta)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationdelta)]

summary.span: 取得或設定操作已依照乘數調整大小的量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized as a multiplier.
The amount the manipulation has resized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性都報告調整大小的操作。The and properties both report a resizing manipulation. 兩者之間的差異是在其報告的值的方式。The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported. 屬性報告與乘數的值。The property reports the value as a multiplier. 如果為 0.5，操作解譯為減少大小的百分之 50。If is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent. 如果為 2，此操作會解譯為增加了 100%的大小。If is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent. 屬性報告中的調整大小操作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]。The property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 此範例套用， ，和屬性來移動、 調整大小，和旋轉。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationdelta)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationdelta)]

summary.span: 取得或設定操作的直線動作。

span.span: Gets or sets the linear motion of the manipulation.
The linear motion of the manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性報告操作會解譯為移動螢幕上的垂直和水平的方式。The property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as moving horizontally and vertically on the screen. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 此範例套用， ，和屬性來移動、 調整大小，和旋轉。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
